Uses of Class
org.gearvrf.animation.GVRAnimation

  • Packages that use GVRAnimation 
    Package Description
    org.gearvrf.animation
    GVRF animations, version 2.0.

    • Uses of GVRAnimation in org.gearvrf.animation

      Subclasses of GVRAnimation in org.gearvrf.animation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GVRColorAnimation
      Animate the overlay color.
      class  GVRMaterialAnimation
      Animate a GVRMaterial.
      class  GVROpacityAnimation
      Animate the opacity.
      class  GVRPostEffectAnimation
      Animate a GVRPostEffect.
      class  GVRRelativeMotionAnimation
      Animate an object's position.
      class  GVRRotationByAxisAnimation
      Rotation animation.
      class  GVRRotationByAxisWithPivotAnimation
      This animation uses GVRTransform.rotateByAxisWithPivot(float, float, float, float, float, float, float) to do an animated rotation about a specific axis, with a specific pivot point.
      class  GVRScaleAnimation
      Size animation.
      class  GVRTransformAnimation
      Animate a GVRTransform.
      Methods in org.gearvrf.animation that return GVRAnimation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GVRAnimation GVRAnimation.setInterpolator(GVRInterpolator interpolator)
      Set the interpolator.
      GVRAnimation GVRAnimation.setOnFinish(GVROnFinish callback)
      Set the on-finish callback.
      GVRAnimation GVRAnimation.setRepeatCount(int repeatCount)
      Set the repeat count.
      GVRAnimation GVRAnimation.setRepeatMode(int repeatMode)
      Set the repeat type.
      GVRAnimation GVRAnimationEngine.start(GVRAnimation animation)
      Registers an animation with the engine: It will start running immediately.
      GVRAnimation GVRAnimation.start(GVRAnimationEngine engine)
      Start the animation.
      Methods in org.gearvrf.animation with parameters of type GVRAnimation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GVROnFinish.finished(GVRAnimation animation)
      Optional callback: called when the animation is complete, and has stopped running.
      boolean GVROnRepeat.iteration(GVRAnimation animation, int count)
      Optional callback, that lets you stop an animation when your app reaches a desired state.
      GVRAnimation GVRAnimationEngine.start(GVRAnimation animation)
      Registers an animation with the engine: It will start running immediately.
      void GVRAnimationEngine.stop(GVRAnimation animation)
      Stop the animation, even if it is still running: the animated object will be left in its current state, not reset to the start or end values.
